name: Don't Be Rash
description:
** NOTE: The game may take a few seconds to load in your browser. Thank you for your patience! Summary

Help Itchman get some ointment for his rash! Scratch his back to keep him from going insane before he makes it to the pharmacy. The more you scratch the worse the rash gets!

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40 Jam. The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is".

Controls
  • Mouse:
    • Click to scratch
    • Click and drag to scratch continuously
    • Move your mouse to the edge of the screen to scroll
Credits
  • Vu Ha - Code
  • Rose Peng - Art
  • Johan Soriao - Music
Notes
